channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia stock is now in a correction as deepening selloff puts the AI chip giant’s market cap below $3 trillion
item.description: The three-day drop erased more than $400 billion from Nvidia’s market capitalization.

item.title: Fundstrat's Tom Lee is about to raise his year-end forecast for the S&P 500
item.description: Tom Lee said strong earnings, coupled with dry powder still on the sidelines, could power the market rally further with S&P 500 reaching 5,800 at the year end.

item.title: Expect the stock market’s winners to keep on winning — until this happens
Armed with $100,000 from the Heritage Foundation, conservative group plans to out government ‘anti-American bad actors’ it believes will resist Trump
item.description: The goal of the American Accountability Foundation is to publish a list of 100 high-ranking government employees hostile to the former president, starting with the Department of Homeland Security.

item.title: Stocks making the biggest moves midday: ResMed, Affirm, Nvidia, Anheuser-Busch and more
item.description: Names on the move ahead of the open.

item.title: Dow industrials striving to extend win streak to five sessions — live coverage
Greece is moving some workers toward a 6-day workweek
item.description: 48-hour work week kicks off on July 1.

item.title: Paramount+ to increase prices for its streaming plans
item.description: Paramount Global's streaming service Paramount+ will raise prices for its plans after its latest merger plan with Skydance fell through.

item.title: Coinbase’s accounting for crypto assets may face regulatory action
Target’s online marketplace pales in comparison to Walmart and Amazon, and now it’s betting on a shiny new deal with Shopify to woo customers
item.description: The partnership will be a first for Target Plus, which has historically been a more selective platform for third-party vendors.

item.title: Ferrari CEO says all-electric model preserves the 'emotion' of the famed supercars
item.description: Ferrari is opening a new E-Building in Maranello, Italy, that will produce internal combustion engine cars alongside hybrid and all-electric models.

item.title: These 11 semiconductor stocks are forecast to outpace Nvidia over the next year
The national debt is over $34 trillion. It’s time to tell the truth about the U.S. government’s finances
item.description: The U.S. government will pay close to $900 billion this year just in interest payments on the national debt.

item.title: Music labels sue AI companies Suno, Udio for U.S. copyright infringement
item.description: The lawsuits claim that the companies copied music without permission to teach their systems to create music at the expense of human artists' work.

item.title: Nvidia’s high-flying stock may be set to enter correction territory
